page.title: 10NEW HOUSING
page.content: The housing at Follaton village is basic as it takes only 4 weeks to build a house.It must have bedrooms,1 bathroom,kitchen,small lounge and a garden of 5 by 4 metres.They are built with wood ,cement blocks and brick with slate roofs.The houses are powered by electricity,the central heating giving tempretures of 21C in main rooms and 16C in others. Eventually the village will have 180 houses occupied mainly by retired people & first time buyers. There is a bus service from the village to Totnes. There is also a 'Self Build' scheme at Swallowfields in Totnes.The houses here are larger,architect designed dwellings.They are built mainly of concrete blocks with slate roofs or timber frame with slate cladding.
